heading: Trio sonatas.
general-note: Here are entered miscellaneous collections of trio sonatas for 2 melody instruments and continuo. Individual trio sonatas and collections of trio sonatas for 2 specific melody instruments and continuo are entered under the heading followed by medium of performance, e.g.. Trio sonatas (Violins (2), continuo).. Works about the trio sonata are entered under the heading. Trio sonata..
